author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...HONE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 5:00 AM HST Sun Aug 25
 the center of Hone was located near 18.3, -156.1
 with movement W at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 988 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.
